VII.i.1.B.1.a
.
Forms VA Uses for Verification Purposes
Each month, the Hines Information Technology Center (ITC) automatically releases
VA Form 21-0538
,
Mandatory Verification of Dependents
, to Veterans in receipt of additional compensation for a spouse and/or child(ren), and
VA Form 21P-0537
,
Marital Status Questionnaire
, to surviving spouses in receipt of Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC).
Cases are automatically selected for review eight years subsequent to the month an initial award is processed and beneficiaries will receive a request to complete one of the above forms.
Upon release of the forms, a 60-day diary is automatically established in the corporate record to control for their return.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Verification of Marital Status and the Status of Dependents
